description:
A man learns to look beyond the surface of a person, a flower seller forgets to keep his promise, and everything is sacred.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuwazu Nyoubou / Hanatare Kozou / Oshou to Kozou no Kami ga Nai
The Wife Who Wouldn`t Eat / The Snot-Nosed Boy / The Priest and the Boy Who Had to Pee!
食わず女房 / 鼻たれ小僧 / 和尚と小僧のかみがない
